wikipedia_page.main: David Hoskins is a television writer who has written several episodes of The Bill and Midsomer Murders. He began writing for The Bill in 1990 with Jumping the Gun, writing an additional 23, and for Midsomer Murders in 2001 with Destroying Angel, writing an additional 9 to date.

response: ★ David Hoskins - Superior Court (Warner Bros. Television)
